ASSOCIATION FOR EHJCATION BT RADIO-TELEVISION
Office of the President
Boston,, Massachusetts
December 9, 195?
TO: All Officers and Directors
FROM: John Adams Rourke, National Membership Chairman
SUBJECT: Biographical Inforaation
We are receiving several requests for information about AERT
from prospective members. In an effort to meet these requests, I
am in the process of preparing a brief write-up which I trust will
adequately tell the Association's story. It will include such
things as a summary of past activities, a description of the way
AERT is organised, advantages of membership, services available,
future plans, and so on*
In order to emphasise the fact that the Association is truly
national in scope, and to show that its activities are managed by
an experienced mid distinguished group of officers and directors,
I would, like to include the names of each of you together with a
few salient facts about you and the nature of your workÂ®
Professor Eartin has suggested that I check to be sure that
the listing I use for each of you is completely accurate and up-to-
date. Would you please# then, fill out the attached form in the
manner in which you would like to see yourself in print?
Since time is of the essence, I would greatly appreciate it
if you would return the completed form to me before the impact
of the Christmas rush.
Thanks veiy much.
/John Adams Rourke
National Membership Chairman
AERT
1 enc.
